titles: London's calamity by fire bewailed and improved in a sermon preached at St. James Dukes-Place wherein the judgements of God are asserted, the times of those judgments specified, the reasons for those judgments assigned, and all in some measure suitably applied / by Robert Elborough ...
author: Elborough, Robert.
publisher: Printed by M.S. for Dorman Newman, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
